summary: This bill designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 620 East Pecan Boulevard in McAllen, Texas, as the “Agent Raul H. Gonzalez Jr. Memorial Post Office Building.” The bill clarifies that any reference to the facility in any legal document will be updated to reflect the new designation. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on March 10, 2025, sponsored by multiple representatives.
